titleInfo.title: 2nd Annual River Ranch Blue Grass Festival (17300)

mods.abstract: Two color window card (red and black on light brown) announcing the 2nd Annual River Ranch Blue Grass Festival featuring the Sullivan Family, Benny Martin, the Lewis Family, and more at the River Ranch Resort on March 5-7. Poster features metal photoplates of Billy Martin and the Sullivan Family. For additional information about this poster see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/39516.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
